thread.section_title: Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Central Park - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Service
thread.title_full: Excellent Service - Review of Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: nina n
title: Excellent Service
text:
Stayed there for a week form 4.3.-11.3.2017. We were given an upgrade due to a noisy room before. The staffer at the front desk was very helpful, her supervising manager was an extremely nice woman who offered to us an upgrade without any discussions. The allocated room was with a superbe view over the Hudson river, the room was aslo totaly quiet no noise at all,many thanks for that unforgettable stay! The Breakfast room was stunning as well as the breakfast itself. Would always choose that Hotel again, not to mention the the very close location to the City of NYC. Perfect Hotel!
Room Tip: In den oberen Etagen ist die Aussicht optimal See more room tips
